publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1068 Mike Rumbles: Prostate Cancer Awareness Week, 22 to 28 March 2004-That the Parliament notes that 22 to 28 March 2004 is Prostate Cancer Awareness Week; notes with concern that prostate cancer is now the most common cancer in men causing around 10,000 deaths annually in the UK, and recognises the important work carried out by prostate cancer support groups around the country in increasing awareness of this condition.

S2M-1068 Mike Rumbles: Prostate Cancer Awareness Week, 22 to 28 March 2004-That the Parliament notes that 22 to 28 March 2004 is Prostate Cancer Awareness Week; notes with concern that prostate cancer is now the most common cancer in men causing around 10,000 deaths annually in the UK, and recognises the important work carried out by prostate cancer support groups around the country in increasing awareness of this condition. Supported by: Mr David Davidson*, Murray Tosh*, Robert Brown*, Richard Lochhead*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Michael McMahon*, Colin Fox*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Bristow Muldoon*, Shona Robison*, Marlyn Glen*, Patrick Harvie*, Christine Grahame*

S2M-1068 Prostate Cancer Awareness Week, 22 to 28 March 2004 (lodged on 18 March 2004) Tommy Sheridan*, Robin Harper*, David Mundell*, Helen Eadie*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Stewart Stevenson*, Shiona Baird*, Eleanor Scott*, Chris Ballance*, Donald Gorrie*, Mike Pringle*
S2M-1068 Prostate Cancer Awareness Week, 22 to 28 March 2004 (lodged on 18 March 2004) Alex Neil*, Bill Butler*, Margaret Jamieson*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Pauline McNeill*
